CustomField.formula: /*TRIM(RIGHT( TEXT(Account.Country_Code_2__c) , LEN(TEXT(Account.Country_Code_2__c))-1 ))+Account.RW_Secondary_Mobile_No__pc*/ TRIM(RIGHT( TEXT(Account.Country_Code_2__c) , LEN(TEXT(Account.Country_Code_2__c))-1 ))+ IF(Account.RW_Secondary_Mobile_No__pc != null, Account.RW_Secondary_Mobile_No__pc, Account.Alternate_Mobile_No__c)
CustomField.label: Secondary Mobile No with Country Code
